body.name: OPTIMISK Baby Bassinet Bedside Sleeper Baby, Crib, and Playpen Mattress, 4in1 Mesh Portable Bassinet with Wheels for Babies and Toddlers up to 12 Months
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 18 hrs 38 mins
features: SAFE AND COMFORTABLE: Comes with sturdy frame, breathable mesh, and secure locking. Easy setting up and breaking down for busy moms. Strong, travel-friendly bassinet mattress. Durable materials, adjustable legs, quality wheels, and CPC Certified for your newborn's safety.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL: Easily and quickly convert between a bedside bassinet, portable baby bed swing bassinet, baby crib, and foldable playpen with mattress. It has adjustable five height settings with two safety straps, allowing you to match the bed's height to your own, making it easier to tend to your baby. You can both rest comfortably and safely.

COMPACT BABY SWING FOR INFANT: This bedside portable bassinet comes with the ability to gently rock or swing, which can help soothe a fussy baby and lull them to sleep. Adjustable legs, joints and locking wheels are of the highest possible quality. Fabrics, mesh and zippers are heavy wearing, yet breathable, soft and heavy padding – thicker than most other mattresses.
EASY TO ASSEMBLE: a portable pack-and-play bassinet that converts into a crib for storage or travel for toddlers up to 12 months old.
WHAT IS INCLUDED: The bassinet includes 1 mattress, 1 mattress Board, and 1 travel bag. Bassinet crib accessories for this product are available and can be purchased separately.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dreamy Bedside Delight for Newborns. Portable, Rocking, and Travel-Friendly Sleeper! Introducing a perfect blend of comfort and convenience for your baby. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and using the finest materials. Our bassinet ensures a safe and cozy environment for your little one. Designed for bedside use, this sleeper keeps your baby close, fostering a stronger bond during those precious early months. It is not just a bed; it's a dreamy haven where your newborn can rest peacefully. The included mattress provides optimal support, ensuring a good night's sleep for your baby. The portable design allows you to pack it up easily, making it an ideal companion for travel or a quick getaway.
Strong, Easy to Use, and Extremely Intuitive

What's Included Bedside Bassinet Converts to a Bedside BassinetSimply roll down the co-sleep side and latch it to your bed. Portable Bassinet Converts to a Portable BassinetSimply unlatch it from your bed and the 4 universal wheels will roll freely. Portable Mini Crib Converts to a Mini CribSimply unzip and extend the bottom half of the basket to the floor. Portable Playpen Converts to a PlaypenSimply unzip the half-circle panel to allow your baby to crawl and play freely.

The Ultimate Multi-Functional Baby Haven - Transforming as Your All-in-One Solution for Baby's Comfort! A multifunctional marvel designed to cater to the diverse needs of both parent and baby. As a bedside bassinet, it fosters the intimacy of having your little one close during those early months, creating a sense of connection that is invaluable. But it doesn't stop there. Its portable design ensures that your baby's comfort is never compromised, whether you're on a family vacation or a quick trip to the grocery store. Compact and lightweight, it effortlessly transforms into a mini crib, offering a dedicated space for your baby's nap or nighttime sleep. The versatility continues with the Playpen, providing a secure and engaging environment for your little one's playtime adventures. It's a complete solution for your baby's essential needs. From the rocking chair functionality for soothing moments to the travel stroller pack for on-the-go convenience, Optimisk has meticulously considered every aspect of parenting to make your journey more enjoyable. Choose Optimisk for a bassinet that not only meets but exceeds your expectations – because your baby deserves the very best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing value & a better long-term solution from a 3rd time mom
reviews.reviewText: I'm a third-time mom so I know a thing or two about what's really needed in a bassinet. And after searching... and searching... and searching... for a co-sleeping bassinet that had 360 degrees of just breathable mesh (no fabric to suffocate on) with wheels and that folded down compactly for storage I FINALLY found this gem. The design could not be better. My kids start rolling onto their sides almost immediately as newborns so mesh sides were a must for me. Most bedside bassinets have tons of fabric on the sides where babies could press their faces up against, which I do not think is safe. I was really hesitant to buy from a brand I hadn't heard about on Amazon, especially one without a ton of reviews but this thing is seriously amazing. I used to have the halo bassinet and I hated it. It was too small, the sheets were expensive, the mattress was hard as a rock, it wasn't an even level sleeping surface, and it was hard to push down on the side to get the baby postpartum. This bassinet is extremely sturdy, can attach to my bed if I want it to, has the drop-down side to make it easy to pick up baby in the middle of the night without using my non-existent painful core muscles. The mattress is firm which baby needs but feels much more comfortable and soft in the best way possible while still being safe, the sleeping area is HUGE I can fit my Snuggle Me Organic (organic doc-a-tot) in it easily (which I couldn't do in my halo bassinet). Not only that but it comes with these awesome bonus hooks to hang burp cloths or pacifiers on the side or whatever you want for easy access, a cute mobile, 4 sheets, a diaper caddy, and the whole thing transitions into a deeper crib for when baby is past 5 months old. With most bassinets, you only get 3-5 months out of it before you have to put them in something deeper like a crib or pack-n-play, but this gem lets me lower the bottom so I can use it for a year in my room! It's smaller than a pack-n-play too so I'm super excited to have a more compact long-term baby product for once. I also love that I can wheel it to the living room for a safe sleep area and play area out there so my other toddlers can see the baby but have a nice safe barrier between them. And honestly for the price, IDK how this isn't the number one seller on Amazon but it probably will be soon. Take my advice and buy this one!P.S. If you want some sheets for it in addition to the 4 it comes with, I highly recommend the Nodnal Co. sheet sets. They fit the mattress on this bassinet perfectly and how cute are they (see my review photo for a preview)! Heres the link: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07V5Z82NT?psc=1&ref=ppx_yo2ov_dt_b_product_details

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, portable bedside bassinet for baby's 1st year!!
reviews.reviewText: This is the most sturdy, well designed bassinet I have ever seen!! I bought it for my first grandbaby, and I've been more & more impressed with the features & quality of this bassinet!! It is the perfect size to roll from the bedroom to living room in an apartment. It was really easy to put together, folds easily for travel. It has easily adjustable heights & you can elevate either end.The mobile that comes with it has 3 cute toys hanging and has a little light the baby can look at (rotates shapes & colors). The piece that holds the mobile is a little hard to get on the first time, it has 2 vibration settings, 3 levels of lullaby music sound, a light for checking on baby & you can turn the mobile on or off. It came with a very nice adjustable wipes & diaper caddy. The bassinet bottom mattress is very sturdy!! It has a zip on sheet (5 zippered sheets included), which are very nice, however I bought bassinet size, waterproof mattress pads & sheets to make it easier for my daughter to change the bedding. It came with 3 additional clips for hanging whatever you'll need at hand. We used them to hang a blanket on one side to block baby from looking at the TV as a newborn. The mattress size is 34" long 19 1/2" wide.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars more than i could’ve wanted
reviews.reviewText: i love this bassinet! planning for a baby is overwhelming. i searched for months for something that i thought would be perfect & this is it. i was so worried that i would be disappointed with this bassinet because it almost seemed too good to be true. that is not the case with this bassinet. the bassinet was so easy to assemble that i was able to do it all by myself at 8 months pregnant. i put it together early as i was worried that i would deliver early so it sat in our living room while we finished renovations for about 2 weeks until we moved it into our room. moving it was very easy because of the wheels on the bottom. i was worried that the bassinet would be too small since most bassinets are pretty compact but this one is very roomy. the bassinet is very sturdy, we have a pitbull that gets very excited about going outside or sniffing baby sister so he has bumped into it a few times but if barely moves. m the mattress on the bassinet is a little firm but i was able to tuck a blanket into it to make it more comfortable & my baby loves it. my baby loves looking at the mobile while it’s moving above her. baby is calmed by the music it plays at 3 different levels & the vibration of the bassinet. the nightlight has been very helpful for late night diaper changes. i love love love the mesh siding so i can see her when she isn’t next to my bed & i love the fact that it has a side that can be tucked down to meet the edge of my bed even more! overall this has been my favorite purchase for our baby. if you are looking for something that has all the works at a reasonable price then look no further!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this bassinet. Wish I had it when my daughter was a newborn, I love the height. At the highest setting it is level with my bed. Very sturdy and well made. I'm not sure it's big enough to fit up to a 1 year old as advertised though. I bought when my daughter was about 4 months and at almost 8 months she has little room length wise so I switched her to a pack n play. I packed up this bassinet for baby #2 and it was super easy to store away. I would still recommend it, even if I only used for a few months but I do wish I got more months out of it. Overall 8/10
